text: Achinkulungwa ŵa mwa ŵandu ŵa Firiauna ni ŵatite (pa kunchoonga Firiauna): “Ana nitin'gambe kunnechelesya Musa ni ŵandu ŵakwe kuti awatanganyeje pa chilambo, ni antundumalile mmwe ni milungu jenu?” Jwalakwe jwatite: “Chituwulaje ŵanache ŵao ŵachilume nikwaleka umi ŵanache ŵao ŵachikongwe, soni chisimu uwwe pa ŵanganyao tukwete machili gakwakombolela.”
